mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITES (FAVORITES_ID, MEMBER_ID, FOOD_ID, CONVENIENCE_ID) VALUES (FAVORITES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{foodId}, #{convenienceId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT F.*, CF.SHOW_STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY F.FAVORITES_ID DESC) AS RN FROM FAVORITES F LEFT JOIN CONVENIENCE_FOOD CF ON F.FOOD_ID = CF.FOOD_ID AND F.CONVENIENCE_ID = CF.CONVENIENCE_ID WHERE F.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CF.SHOW_STATUS = 1 ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FOOD_ID = #{foodId} AND CONVENIENCE_ID = #{convenienceId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FOOD_ID = #{foodId} AND CONVENIENCE_ID = #{convenienceId}
